Static Gift Bag Test

A Test Site Based on David Efhan's Static Gift Bag

A HTML + CSS + JS base front-end starter for simple web site projects modified from David Efhan (@frzrbox)'s Static Gift Bag.

Auto Grids

Auto-centered elements with no media queries (will auto wrap when too small to fit).

Lax.js Support

A 3rd party, 3K minified, easy-to-use solution for simple scroll-triggered animations via data-atributes (no javascript required).

Fading In & Out on Scroll

Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Fugit enim ducimus porro saepe voluptate, amet quos iure maiores omnis qui, dolor natus voluptatem eligendi molestiae quas aut corrupti cum ex?

Drifting Left & Right on Scroll

Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Fugit enim ducimus porro saepe voluptate, amet quos iure maiores omnis qui, dolor natus voluptatem eligendi molestiae quas aut corrupti cum ex?

Event-groups

Custom event-group data attributes for a markup (no-javascript) way of triggering onclick events.

data-event='event-listener'
data-event-element='element-changing'
data-event-add='class-added-to-element'
